name: ByteBurst: Hacking Simulator
description:
"ByteBurst" invites you to an exhilarating action and strategy adventure, delving into the mysterious world of computer hacking. Transition from an ordinary computer user to navigating the dark corners of the digital kingdom in this thrilling game.

Key Features:

  • Hack and Defend: Infiltrate the depths of the digital world by solving challenging puzzles and bypassing security systems. Strengthen your own systems and devise defense strategies against attacks from other players.

  • Advanced Hacker Tools: Master the command prompt, tackle complex SQL injectors, and seize your targets using remote control tools. Win the information warfare with brute-force software and log cleaners.

  • Cyber Space Competitions: Compete with other players and participate in cyber space competitions to climb the rankings. Engage in battles with rivals as you strive to become the ultimate hacker.
